short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A secure password manager for all of your devices.
short.zh_CN: 安全的跨平台密码管理器。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Want a powerful, top secure password manager? Web3Password is a decentralized password manager that is secure, decentralized and trustless. It has no ads, no trackers, and does not collect any user behavior logs. You can confidently manage your online password data across all your devices.

Why Web3Password Password Manager
- Secure as Bitcoin
Web3Password innovatively introduces BIP39/BIP44 private key of Bitcoin to encrypt all your data, therefore your data as secure as Bitcoin.

- Easy
With a few steps, you could autofill credentials on your devices. You no longer need to remember any passwords.

- Secure Share
With  a few steps, you could share your confidential data with your family members, friends, or collaborators easily.

- Account Security
Signup no need Email, Phone , Password etc,  no brute-force cracking security issue.

- Data Security
Mnemonic Phrase is only stored on your device, data is cross-encrypted by multiple algorithms.

- Ownership
Data could be stored in blockchain of L2, so user has the ownership of data.

- Decentralization
Easily self-hosted  to meet security  and audit.

- Easy to Keep
You only need to keep the Mnemonic Phrase, completely solve the problem of users being hard to keep keys.

- Transparent
The communication is transparent and ease to audit for third party.

Need assistance? Email support@web3password.com, and we’ll get back to you right away.
Privacy Policy: https://web3password.com/privacy
Terms of Use: https://web3password.com/terms
